materials: Emeralds. Crafted with traditional Hyderabadi Kundan setting.
features: Exquisitely designed Jhumka featuring intricate filigree work and Kundan setting. The centerpiece is a vibrant emerald, complemented by a floral emerald accent. The design takes inspiration from temple architecture, showcasing the regal aesthetic of South Indian jewelry. Delicate diamond accents frame the emeralds, enhancing their brilliance. Suspended diamond drops for added movement.
occasions: or a sophisticated evening out. A stunning choice for a bride's reception (swagatam) or any grand celebration.
description: A timeless heirloom piece combining traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The use of high-quality emeralds and diamonds ensures lasting value and brilliance. The Hyderabadi Kundan setting showcases exceptional craftsmanship and attention to detail. A statement piece that will elevate any ensemble and make you the center of attention.
